final_production_data.main_heading: Fire in Hong Kong Apartments Leaves 36 Dead, Hundreds Missing
headlines: Fire engulfs Hong Kong apartments, killing 36 and leaving hundreds missing
Investigation underway into building materials contributing to rapid fire spread
Hong Kong firefighters work to control blaze at Tai Po district apartment complex
tts_script: A fire in an apartment complex in Hong Kong's northern Tai Po district has left 36 dead and hundreds missing. Firefighters are working to control the blaze, with police investigating whether building materials contributed to its rapid spread.

original_raw_news.original_title: Live Updates: Fire Engulfs Hong Kong Apartments, Killing 36 and Leaving Hundreds Missing
original_raw_news.original_summary: Firefighters were gradually getting the blaze under control at an apartment complex in the city’s northern Tai Po district. Police were investigating whether building and scaffolding materials contributed to the fire's rapid spread.
